metadata.title: CVE-2018-20743 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: murmur in Mumble through 1.2.19 before 2018-08-31 mishandles multiple concurrent requests that are persisted in the database, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon hang or crash) via a message flood.

criterions.comment: mumble package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0~git20190114.9fcc588+dfsg-1').
